A Spring component that maps internal audit log DTOs to external REST API response objects, handling conversions between different layers of the application.

## Key Components

**Main Mapping Methods:**
- `toLogResponse()` - Converts single LogEvent to LogResponse
- `toLogsResponse()` - Converts paginated LogEvent results to LogsResponse with page info
- `toLogFilterResponse()` - Maps LogFilters to LogFilterResponse with organization details
- `toLogFilterOptions()` - Converts LogFilterCriteria to LogFilterOptions
- `toLogDetailsResponse()` - Maps LogDetails to detailed LogDetailsResponse

**Base Class:** Extends `BaseRestMapper` for common mapping utilities like `toRestPageInfo()`

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private LogMapper logMapper;

// Map single log event
LogEvent event = getLogEvent();
LogResponse response = logMapper.toLogResponse(event);

// Map paginated results
GenericQueryResult<LogEvent> queryResult = logService.getLogs();
LogsResponse logsResponse = logMapper.toLogsResponse(queryResult);

// Map filter criteria for API requests
LogFilterCriteria criteria = buildFilterCriteria();
LogFilterOptions options = logMapper.toLogFilterOptions(criteria);

// Get detailed log response
LogDetails details = getLogDetails();
LogDetailsResponse detailsResponse = logMapper.toLogDetailsResponse(details);
```

The mapper safely handles null inputs and provides clean separation between internal domain objects and external API contracts.
